message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value, I'm asking for $14,000. I think you'll be very happy with this purchase!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to stay within my budget.
Bob, I understand your budget concerns, but $12,000 is quite a bit lower than I hoped for.  How about we meet in the middle at $13,000?  It's a fantastic deal for a product you won't regret owning!
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to go down to $12,500?
